comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic appeared in the Sydney Mail 12 July 1911...my guess is that it came from the Sydney Mail's photo archive and that it wasn't a contemporary pic. By 1911, Kerry appears to have moved on from the Sydney Mail...by this time most of the pics in the SM appear to have been the work of staff photographers...hence they don't show up in the Tyrrell Collection.
